title: Pygobject Py And Feeder Py Ported
content:
--- title: "pygobject.py and feeder.py ported" kind: article created_at: 2014-05-29 07:00:00 UTC author: Amanpreet (Porting Flumotion) image: https://avatars2.githubusercontent.com/u/2363074?s=50 categories: GSoC-2014 tags: "news flumotion" layout: post ---

Ported flumotion/common/pygobject.py Tests pass:

flumotion.test.test_common_pygobject

    testButton ...                                                         [OK]
  TestPyGObject
    testPyGObject ...                                                      [OK]

PASSED (successes=2)

Ported flumotion/component/feeder.py Tests pass:

    test_clientConnected ...                                               [OK]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Tomorrow, I plan to port padmonitor, feedcomponent and other remaining base modules.

Originally posted on Porting Flumotion - GSoC '14 Progress Blog
